title: Why ELO Boost is needed for League Of Legend? (Ekta yadav)
text: By Ekta yadav Oct 2, 2015 There are some basic things that you can do to ensure yourself the best possible effect of ELO boost will do on your account and on your gameplay afterwards. There was an older blog spot about the situations which are the best to buy an ELO boost. In this article I will present you some efforts that you can do to get the maximum out of your ELO boost. To start with there are the basic advice that every player knows who plays ranked games seriously. These advice are about the basic things that you have to look out for during, before and after ranked games. There is a writing about the importance of champion selection. While in game there are some common facts that you must keep in mind. Such things like focus, map awareness and team communication are all very important. The state of mind that you have after a win or a loss can both affect your next game in a bad or a good way. By keeping the basic rules in mind try yourself in ranked games. These should give you some boost towards your dream tier. By giving everything you got but you cannot see further improvements, this should mean that you are ready to buy an ELO boost. Before you do that there are other things you should think through. Buying a boost means that your account will be unavailable for you to play depending how big boost you are planning to get. It is logical to get a boost before a time period when you will see yourself unavailable to play the game. Before a holiday, or before a long week when you have many work or studies to do. Taking a break from the game can help you to make progress in your regular life and it will be able to make you come back to the game stronger, ELO boosted in a higher division so everything is ready for you to give the best form of your play in the ranked queue. After purchasing the boost all you have to do is relax. You do not even have to be close to a computer if you are curious about the progress on your League of Legends account. If you have a smartphone you can easily access the member's area by logging in and you can follow your progress wherever you go.
